summary: This is an email from March 3, 2021, discussing a woman who was doing hand modeling and fashion modeling, and mentions running into her at a fashion shoot in Los Angeles where Jennifer Lopez (J Lo) was doing bathing suits. The email appears to be a personal recollection.

persons.name: J Lo
persons.context: Mentioned as the celebrity doing bathing suits at a fashion shoot in Los Angeles where the sender later ran into the subject of the email.

events.title: Fashion shoot in LA
events.description: A fashion shoot in Los Angeles where Jennifer Lopez (J Lo) was doing bathing suits. The sender of the email later ran into a woman (the subject of the email) at this shoot.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated March 3, 2021.
It discusses a woman who was involved in hand modeling and fashion modeling.
The sender mentions running into this woman at a fashion shoot in Los Angeles featuring Jennifer Lopez (J Lo).
